data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Singrauli. Through your servants plant 44 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Singrauli, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 2,423 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Singrauli.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Singrauli, Madhya Pradesh, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Singrauli, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Pao people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Singrauli who will make disciples who make disciples.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Singrauli, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary:
the county of Singrauli, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 220,300.

We estimate Singrauli has 2,423 people who might know Jesus, 2,673 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 215,204 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Singrauli that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.
